Power, 
      Passion And Poison 
Saturday, May 5, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT
 
Kathy Augustine lived a life 
      of power and politics. She was smart, ambitious, and a rising star in the 
      Nevada Republican party. But her hard-nosed tactics were controversial, 
      and she had her share of political enemies.
 
She also had four 
      husbands.
 
When she died suddenly in 
      2006, friends and family members were suspicious. She did have a 
      potentially fatal drug in her system, but was she poisoned? And if so, who 
      did it?
 
Correspondent Troy 
      Roberts 
      reports for 48 Hours 
      Mystery, this Saturday, May 5, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT.
 
Click 
      here to 
      watch Roberts' reporter's notebook.
